chapters.description: Inspect networks, decode CIDRs, and practice floating IP allocation.

chapters.description: Pin providers, manage state, and rehearse multi-cloud workflows.

chapters.title: Day 4 – Keep It Running
chapters.description: Read plans like a detective, lock state, and destroy labs responsibly.

chapters.title: Day 5 – Variables & Modules
chapters.description: Master input variables, outputs, and reusable Terraform modules.

chapters.title: Day 6 – Network Deep Dive
chapters.description: Build a complete network module with routers, subnets, security groups, and floating IPs.

chapters.description: Debug br-ex bridge issues, Neutron namespaces, and floating IP connectivity problems.
